raw_body: EDIRISINGHE – KAMALA MALINI – Dearly beloved wife of late Dr E.M.S. Edirisinghe,​ loving mother of Nalaka & Nayomi,​ loving mother-in-law of Ashok Muniappan,​ loving grandmother of Kumar,​ Krishantha,​ Nitin & Nikhil,​ daughter of late Dhammadasa Arandara & late Allen Perera,​ sister of late Paul Siriveera,​ late Prema Perera,​ Nanda Ranasinghe and Milton Arandara. Cortege leaves residence on Saturday 14th at 4.45 p.m. for Cremation at Borella Kanatte 5.30 p.m. 506/​2,​ Elvitigala Mw.,​ Col. 15.066346
